cvrf:DocumentPublisher.cvrf:IssuingAuthority: CyberXML translates upstream vendor Security Notices into CVRF format. These CVRF publications are neither approved nor authorized by the upstream vendor.

cvrf:Revision.cvrf:Description: CyberXML Draft CVRF translated from Vendor HTML

cvrf:DocumentNotes.cvrf:Note: The information provided is provided "as is" without warranty of any kind. CyberXML disclaims all warranties, either express or implied, including the warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose. In no event shall CyberXML be liable for any damages whatsoever including direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, loss of business profits or special damages, even if CyberXML has been advised of the possibility of such damages. Some states do not allow the exclusion or limitation of liability for consequential or incidental damages so the foregoing limitation may not apply.
The CVRF document reformats information published by an upstream vendor without consent, authorization, or approval of the original source.
